subject: Marketing
title: Heatmaps and Eye Tracking
description: A 60-second lesson on Heatmaps and Eye Tracking.

hook.text: Eye tracking studies show people read web pages in an F-shaped patternâ€”ignoring most of the page.

buildup.text: Heatmaps visualize where users look, click, and scroll on a page.

discovery.text: Placing key copy and CTAs in high-attention zones dramatically increases engagement.

twist.text: Important copy below the fold or in low-attention zones might as well be invisible.

climax.text: Understanding visual behavior lets copywriters place words where eyes actually land.

punchline.text: Put the right words where the eyes already go.

quiz.question: What reading pattern do most people follow on web pages?
options: An F-shaped pattern focusing on top and left areas
A Z-shaped pattern covering the entire page
Random scanning with no consistent pattern
